title: IPH 515 - My hope is built on nothing less

lines: My hope is built on nothing less
no merit of my own I claim,
but wholly trust in Jesus’ name
When darkness veils His lovely face,
I rest on His unchanging grace;
in every high and stormy gale,
my anchor holds and will not fail.
His oath, His covenant and His blood
support me in the rising flood;
when all around my soul gives way,
He then is all my hope and stay.
When the last trumpet’s voice shall sound,
O may I then in Him be found,
Faultless to stand before the throne!

chorus:
On Christ, the solid rock, I stand,
all other ground is sinking sand.
